column1: VETTPRO Platform: Definitive Production Feature Matrix

column3: Detailed Line-by-Line Functionality
The system is built on Next.js API Routes, creating a secure backend layer.
The frontend (React) communicates exclusively with these internal API routes.
Direct database or external service access from the client-side is strictly prohibited.
Utilizes a single Postgres database as the ultimate source of truth for all application data.
Employs Prisma ORM for type-safe, secure, and efficient database queries from the Next.js backend.
n8n acts as the dedicated, isolated engine for all external communications.
Manages automated workflows for pulling supplier data from client ERPs (e.g., Coupa).
Initiates vetting requests by securely calling external provider APIs (e.g., MIE).
Receives vetting results and writes them to the Postgres database for processing.
Triggers AI/LLM analysis workflows based on database events (e.g., new report received).
Deploys application servers in an Active-Passive configuration behind a load balancer for seamless failover.
Utilizes a managed, replicated Postgres database service (e.g., AWS RDS Multi-AZ) for automated, instantaneous database failover with zero data loss.
Maintains a full, hot-site replica of the application and database in a separate, in-country data center.
Implements Point-in-Time Recovery (PITR) for the database, allowing restoration to any specific second to neutralize data corruption or ransomware events.
Enforces TLS 1.2+ for all data in transit between the user, the application, and all external APIs.
Implements AES-256 bit encryption for all sensitive data at rest within the Postgres database.
An "Administration" module allows a Super Admin to create and define custom user roles (e.g., "Finance," "Vetting Officer," "Field Agent Manager").
Each feature/action in the application is a distinct permission that can be assigned to a role (e.g., can_initiate_vetting, can_view_pricing, can_approve_invoice).
Users are assigned roles, inheriting the specific permissions of that role.
Logs every user authentication attempt (success and failure), including IP address and timestamp.
Logs all read/write operations on critical data entities (e.g., who viewed a report, who changed a supplier's status) to comply with POPIA.
Logs every external API call made by the n8n orchestration engine for full traceability.
Enforces minimum password complexity (e.g., length, uppercase, lowercase, number, symbol).
Mandates password expiration every 6 months, forcing users to set a new password.
Implements an account lockout mechanism after a configurable number of failed login attempts.
Implements a configurable idle session timeout, automatically logging out users after a period of inactivity to prevent unauthorized access.
Features a bell icon in the main UI header that displays a real-time badge for unread notifications.
Clicking the bell icon opens a dropdown list of recent, categorized notifications (e.g., "Alert," "Task Assigned," "Report Ready").
An admin panel allows configuration of notification rules.
For each event type (e.g., "Critical Risk Flagged"), admins can assign specific user roles, groups, or individual users to receive the notification.
Admins can configure the delivery channel for each notification rule (In-App, Email, SMS).
Every main data table in the application (e.g., Active Cases, Completed Reports, Invoices) features an "Export to CSV/Excel" button.
The export function respects any active filters applied to the table, ensuring the user exports exactly what they see.
The exported data contains all relevant text and numerical data, excluding images or complex objects.
The system can generate professional, multi-page PDF documents on-demand for completed vetting reports and interim case summaries.
PDFs are dynamically generated from the data, including text, tables, and charts, and are branded with the VETTPRO (or client's white-label) logo.
A multi-step UI for initiating new vetting processes for Individuals, Companies, or Staff Medicals.
Features a live-updating summary panel showing the calculated cost and turnaround time as checks are selected.
Provides "Provider Intelligence" tooltips with historical performance data for different vetting providers.

column2: Vetting Check: Individual - KYC ID Verification
column3: Verifies a South African ID number for validity, checks against the Department of Home Affairs database, and confirms the individual is not deceased.
Initiates a basic lifestyle audit to identify potential conflicts of interest or indicators of unexplained wealth (as per vetting.pdf).

column2: Vetting Check: Individual - Proof of Income
column3: Verifies stated income through relevant financial documentation analysis.
Retrieves a comprehensive personal credit report, including payment history, defaults, judgments, and overall credit score.
Performs a check against the SAPS criminal database using AFIS fingerprint data or ID number.
Verifies the validity, codes, and status of a South African driver's license.
Verifies academic and professional qualifications with the issuing institutions.
Verifies vehicle ownership details against the NaTIS database.
Retrieves a full CIPC report, including company registration status, director information, and physical/postal addresses.
Retrieves a comprehensive business credit report, assessing the company's financial health, payment behavior, and risk score.

column2: Vetting Check: Company - Bank Account Verification
column3: Confirms the validity and ownership of a company's stated bank account to prevent payment fraud.
Verifies the company's Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment certificate and status.
Checks for a valid Certificate of Good Standing with the Compensation Fund.
Performs a search across news and media sources for any adverse mentions related to the company or its directors.
Screens the company and its directors against Anti-Money Laundering watchlists.

column2: Vetting Check: Business Location - Physical Photo
column3: A workflow for field agents to capture a geotagged and timestamped photo of a business's physical premises using a mobile device.

column2: Vetting Check: Business Location - Geofence Analysis
column3: The system automatically compares the captured GPS coordinates from a physical verification against pre-defined client geofences to confirm local operations.
An interactive dashboard for tracking active cases, featuring an expandable timeline view for each case to visualize the status and dependencies of all individual checks.
The system automatically identifies and visually flags cases that are stalled due to a single dependency (e.g., "Awaiting Consent"), enabling proactive management.
A centralized dashboard to track all consent requests, featuring a visual "Consent Journey" stepper (Sent -> Opened -> Viewed -> Submitted) for each request.
The system can send consent requests via SMS or Email and allows admins to switch channels for requests that are not being responded to.

column2: Digital Signature Verification with AI Assist
column3: A modal for verifying submitted digital signatures, which displays the submitted signature side-by-side with a reference signature (e.g., from an ID copy) and provides a simulated "Match Confidence" score.
Analyzes RFP documents for signs of fraudulent or collusive language patterns before they are even sent out to suppliers.
A visual, side-by-side comparison of a submitted invoice against its corresponding RFP, highlighting discrepancies in line items, quantities, and pricing.
The system automatically flags any invoice that is submitted after the official project completion date specified in the RFP, a critical indicator of potential fraud.
Automatically calculates and flags the percentage deviation of an invoice's total amount compared to the original RFP's budget.
The LLM analyzes invoice data to detect statistical outliers, such as amounts that are significantly higher than the historical average for that supplier or service type.
A dedicated module for field agents to register local community members, capturing their personal details, skills, qualifications, and contact information.
Includes a workflow to digitally capture consent from community members for pre-vetting, creating a pool of "vetting-ready" local talent.
A master database of all canvassed community members, searchable and filterable by skillset, location, and vetting status for easy recruitment by clients.
A module to manage the field agent workforce, assign tasks (location verifications, community canvassing), and monitor performance and task completion rates.
